pages.text: The $(thing)Coke Oven$() is the first important machine needed to progress through $(o)Immersive Engineering$(). It burns $(thing)Bituminous Coal$() in a low oxygen environment, cretaing a carbon rich fuel, $(thing)Coal Coke$(), or logs to make $(l:mechanics/charcoal_pit)Charcoal$().$(br2)$(br2)Additionally it produces $(thing)Creosote Oil$() as a byproduct, which can be used to stain wood.
Click the center block of any face with an $(thing)Engineer's Hammer$() to assemble the multiblock.
